content: as it will sew back side of leg to body not through both front & back be used to attach foot note it s easier to sew side closest to tummy 1st not like i did sew in this direction here or noted in instructions attach back layer of leg pin feet attach foot to front of round 13 of leg 4 for the foot pin feet to the bottom of the body there will about 8 rounds between to 2 feet see photo the lateral edge of the foot should align with the front free edge of round 13 of the leg you will end up attaching rounds 7-11 of the foot to the round 13 of the leg you can change the positioning as you like however i would suggest angling the body forward as the tail is heavy for the squirrel to balance it will need to lean forward a bit using the yarn tail from the leg start by attaching the foot to the front half of round 13 of the leg and then continue on around attaching the foot to the body weave in the yarn tail repeat on the other side you may need to play with the positioning of the foot for it to balance/stand appropriately 5 pin the arm 1 row below the connection of the head to the body and about 3 stitches from the tummy in an angled manner sew on back of arm and then attach the underarm area repeat on other side 6 attach the tail ~3-5 rounds above where the foot attaches to the body or to your preference start by attaching round 25 of the tail to the body and then continue around the edge of the rectangle/trapezoid which is free from the chains refer to pictures weave in tail attach underarm to secure well attach round 25 of tail to body sew back of clear rectangular area to body 7 embroider on the nose in the shape you wish i used a contrasting color darker brown or black in varying positions for one i started in the center of the magic_ring as the bottom of the nose brown squirrel but i varied this with the others orange & chocolate squirrels you can add a mouth as well if you have a safety nose you can try that too the ones i had were too small for my liking 8 in the same color as the nose embroider the paws to finish the project off i put 2 lines and you re done unless you want to add some accessories extra accessories materials 3 5 mm hook yarn worsted color a white color b blue i used loops & threads impeccable white ~14 yd and misty blue ~10 yd small pompom you can make one yourself which i did with using the fork method hat yarn a white and yarn b blue starting with yarn a crochet in continuous rounds round 1 make a magic_ring single_crochet
